com.mappedin.sdk

Class MapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.mappedin.sdk.MapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class MapView
extends android.app.Fragment
implements android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer
    MapView is a custom view designed to handle displaying Maps for a Venue. call setMap(Map) to display the first map.

      • setMap

        public void setMap(@NonNull
                   Map map)

        Sets the MapView to display specific map associated with the current venue.

        This will also draw any part of the current path (if it exists) that falls onto the new map.

        Parameters:
        map - The map to display. Typically this would be another floor.

      • setDelegate

        public void setDelegate(MapViewDelegate delegate)
        Your MapViewDelegate, whose functions will get called when the has certain interactions with the MapView
        Parameters:

      • getCamera

        public MapViewCamera getCamera()
        Get the Camera associate with current map
        Returns:
        current MapViewCamera

      • addPath

        public void addPath(Path path)
        Add a new Path instance to the MapView. Will only show the segments of the path that are on the current map. When switching to a new map, all path segments on the old map are removed and all segments on the new map are added automatically.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to show on a MapView

      • removeAllPaths

        public void removeAllPaths()
        Remove all Path instances from the MapView. Will remove all segments of all the paths from all maps.

      • removePath

        public void removePath(Path path)
        Remove a specific Path instance from the MapView. Will remove all segments of the path from all maps.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to remove on a MapView

      • addMarker

        public void addMarker(Overlay Label)
        Add a Overlay to the MapView, hide if it collides with another Overlay. If the Overlay is already owned by another MapView, this will fail.
        Parameters:
        Label - An anchored Overlay to place on the MapView

      • addMarker

        public void addMarker(Overlay label,
                      boolean hideWhenCollide)
        Add a Overlay to the MapView, optionally telling it to not hide if it collides with another Overlay. If the Overlay is already owned by another MapView, this will fail.
        Parameters:
        label - An anchored Overlay to place on the MapView
        hideWhenCollide - A Bool that indicates whether this Overlay should disappear if it collides with a Overlay you added earlier.

      • removeMarker

        public void removeMarker(Overlay label)
        Remove a Overlay from the MapView
        Parameters:
        label - An Overlay to remove from the MapView

      • removeAllMarkers

        public void removeAllMarkers()
        Removes all Overlay from the MapView

        public void setColor(Polygon polygon,
                     int color)
        Changes the polygon color (can be used as highlight Polygon function)
        Parameters:
        polygon - Polygon
        color - Color

        public void resetColor(Polygon polygon)
        Sets the polygon to it's original color
        Parameters:
        polygon - Polygon
